content.title: Invitations
content.data:
Why shouild I setup chat invitations

Sending a personalized invitation is an easy and effective way of starting a chat with a visitor. Invitation can appear in your chat window with a customized message and your agent’s photo. This makes it really easy to connect with your online visitors.

With invitations, you will:

  • Get more chats – the more personalized and targeted your chat invitation is, the higher the possibility of chatting with visitors
  • Turn visitors into customers – visitors invited to chat are 6.3 times more likely to convert into customers than the ones who don’t chat; 61% of those customers convert within the first chat
  • Increase customer satisfaction – your customer will leave your site happy and willing to return; they can tell their friends and colleagues about the great experience they had, gaining you some new visitors
  • Sell more – the more chances you have, the higher number of buyers you will eventually get

Selecting chat window type

Chat window could be the next types - embedded or popup.

Each group could has own invitation view.

Invitation's view and behaviour depends from chat window types. Type of chat window you can change using Settings -> Chat -> Chat window.

Creating an invitation

Creating a chat invitation is a simple and quick process. How to do it you can find below.

Creating an invitation for embedded chat window.

Follow the steps below to create your invitation:

  1. You can change invitation's settings in section Settings -> Chat -> Invitations. There you can see how invitation will look in visitor's browser.

  1. Turn off/on automatic invitation. If automatic invitation turned on then a visitor will get invitation automatically after 20 seconds spent on your website. Otherwise an agent could send invitation to visitor himself.

Note: A visitor could get invitation later than 20 seconds. It depends there are available agents on that moment or not.

  1. Enter custom invitation phrase.
  2. Click 'Save' button.

Creating an invitation for popup chat window.

Follow the steps below to create your invitation:

  1. You can change invitation's settings in section Settings -> Chat -> Invitations. There you can see how invitation will look in visitor's browser.

  1. Turn off/on automatic invitation. If automatic invitation turned on then a visitor will get invitation automatically after 20 seconds spent on your website. Otherwise an agent could send invitation to visitor himself.

Note: A visitor could get invitation later than 20 seconds. It depends there are available agents on that moment or not.

  1. Select an invitation image.
  1. Also you can upload own invitation image. For uploaded image you can define place for invitation message and special area where visitor could click and invitation will be closed.
  1. Enter custom invitation phrase.
  2. Select an invitation position.
  3. Select a transition effect.
  4. Click 'Save' button
